ingredients.ingredient: 12 ounces raw shrimp (26 to 30 count), peeled and deveined
1 teaspoon Cajun blackened seasoning, or to taste

cookingTips: Pat shrimp dry before seasoning to allow the spices to adhere properly
Use high heat and don't move the shrimp around - let them develop a proper char
Cook for only 2-3 minutes total; overcooked shrimp becomes tough and rubbery
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show the user how to quickly sear shrimp to perfection with bold blackened flavors.
